title: Autonomy Support Training (AST) Program for Low-Skilled Job Supervisors

context.prior_knowledge: Supervisory experience or foundational knowledge of leadership principles
context.additional_context: Customized training program reflecting adult learners' characteristics and self-determination theory (SDT). Emphasizing digital device utilization and application to real job contexts

learning_goals: Participants can apply at least three specific communication techniques to delegate autonomy to team members within three months
Participants can utilize self-assessment tools to evaluate team members' intrinsic motivation levels by the end of the six-month course
Participants can practice autonomy-supportive leadership techniques at a frequency of 80% or higher during actual project implementation
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
